Package org.apache.ddlutils.model

This package contains the classes making up the database model.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Index Represents an index definition for a table which may be either unique or non-unique.
 

Class Summary
Column Represents a column in the database model.
Database Represents the database model, ie.
ForeignKey Represents a database foreign key.
IndexColumn Represents a column of an index in the database model.
IndexImpBase Base class for indices.
JdbcTypeCategoryEnum Represents the different categories of jdbc types.
NonUniqueIndex Represents an index definition for a table.
Reference Represents a reference between a column in the local table and a column in another table.
Table Represents a table in the database model.
TypeMap A class that maps SQL type names to their JDBC type ID found in Types and vice versa.
UniqueIndex Provides compatibility with Torque-style xml with separate <index> and <unique> tags, but adds no functionality.
 

Exception Summary
ModelException Indicates a model error.
 

Package org.apache.ddlutils.model Description

This package contains the classes making up the database model.
